```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dslabs)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
gap2011 <- gapminder %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  filter(year == 2011)
```

<br>

## Fertility

*Infant mortality vs Fertility*

```{r}
gap2011 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= fertility, y=infant_mortality, size= population, color= continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
```

*Infant mortality vs Fertility boxplot*

```{r}
gap2011 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= fertility, y=infant_mortality, size= population, color= continent)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
